title: For Sale: Doc Casey CSA 8.5 NM/MT+
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale: Doc Casey CSA 8.5 NM/MT+
posts.post_content:
See pics here:
[url]https://imgur.com/a/Kegle5c[/url]


Card is extremely tough to find in high grade, and features extremely scarce factory 25 back. There are only 2 PSA 8's of all backs, this card is a great alternative price wise. Card does measure out properly and might be a good gamble on cracking out....$675 delivered.... Price reduced to $585, thanks

How about a price?

Thanks

Barry
